question: [File: contract/AElf.Contracts.Genesis/BasicContractZeroContract_ACS1_TransactionFeeProvider.cs] [Function: RequiredMethodFeeControllerSet()] [Initialization Reentrancy] Can the GetDefaultOrganizationAddress call at line 66 reenter RequiredMethodFeeControllerSet before line 70 completes, causing duplicate initialization? (High)

(Low)

[File: contract/AElf.Contracts.Genesis/BasicContractZeroContract_ACS1_TransactionFeeProvider.cs] [Function: SetMethodFee()] [Self-Referential Fee] Can SetMethodFee be called to set fees for itself (input.MethodName = 'SetMethodFee'), and does this create a circular dependency or lockout scenario?
